delete.description: Delete a custom event by its ID.

post.description: Create a new historical event with the provided details.

get.description: Get details of a historical event by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a historical event by its ID.

patch.description: Partially update an existing historical event.

post.description: Create new media with the provided details.

get.description: Get details of media by its ID.

parameters.description: Search by title, description, or tags
parameters.name: search_term

post.description: Create a new memory with the provided details.

get.description: Get details of a memory by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a memory by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a milestone by its ID.
